About.title: About
About.description: Learn more about our platform and our commitment to connecting talent with opportunity
About.missionContent: To empower job seekers and employers by providing a seamless, efficient, and transparent platform for job discovery and recruitment. We strive to bridge the gap between talent and opportunity, making the job search process more accessible and effective for everyone.
About.visionContent: To become the leading job portal in Azerbaijan, transforming how people find jobs and how companies hire talent. We envision a future where every qualified candidate can find their dream job and every employer can find their ideal team member.
About.teamContent: We are a dedicated team of professionals passionate about technology and human resources. Our diverse team brings together expertise in software development, HR management, and user experience to create the best possible platform for our users.
About.valuesContent: We are committed to innovation, transparency, and user satisfaction. Our values guide everything we do, from platform development to customer service. We believe in continuous improvement and putting our users' needs first.
About.feature1Description: Our intuitive interface makes job searching and posting simple and efficient for everyone.
About.feature2Description: Every job posting is verified to ensure authenticity and protect our users from scams.
About.feature3Description: Our dedicated support team is always ready to help you with any questions or concerns.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.description: All offers are subject to our terms and conditions. Premium features may require additional verification. Contact our support team for more information.
